internships.title: Software Developer Co-op
experience: Collaborated with developers to build a system that currently processes over $7 billion in port revenue.
Developed software solutions tailored to the specifications of various high-traffic port workflows
Improved development efficiency by writing scripts to automatically generate large datasets for testing within seconds, optimizing a process that usually took over 20 minutes per case.
Designed and programmed over 40 fee configuration items compliant with customer requirements and maritime regulations, responsible for complex billing calculations and validations.

projects.name: Mobile Wedding E-invite
experience: Developed an interactive mobile invite system that served over 70 customized Spanish invitations.
Created modular, elegant and interactive UI components.
Implemented Firestore to extract guest information and trigger custom behaviors (to view an example use +1(647)704-2430 as input).

projects.name: Typing Turtle
experience: Built a dynamic web application for typing practice, with a focus on seamless interactivity.
Created an engaging, tactile experience by maintaining dynamically updated state on user input.
Utilized GitHub Pages for deployment and hosting for ease of access.

projects.name: GrocerEase
experience: Developed an application that auto generates a grocery list based on the users’ favorite recipes.
Designed and built intuitive, interactive components and interfaces.
Created a robust database schema, alongside a layer of authentication, for storing lists and recipes.

work-experience.title: Applications Engineering Specialist
experience: Assisted the support team by troubleshooting hardware and software malfunctions on active robots at different facilities.
Provided troubleshooting assistance to the tech support team on live robots at different customer facilities including diagnosing hardware malfunctions and software errors.
Improved tech support diagnosing processes by updating python scripts used to read robot bag files.
Created web forms in Salesforce for third parties using Apex classes and HTML.

work-experience.title: Engineering Technician
experience: Created 3D models of large scale projects including a robot work cell and a new aluminum manufacturing facility using SolidWorks and AutoCAD.
Single-handedly implemented a FANUC robot cell that polishes materials while using pneumatic systems to sort aluminum products.

Lead the development of the new facility by delegating tasks to team members, supervising technicians’ work, creating engineering drawings for equipment fabrication, sourcing equipment, maximizing installation efficiency and managing project timelines.
